full_summary:
**Title**
Security Guard Services

**Reference information**
Reference number: MX-22633542772
Solicitation number: 202209001
Publication date: 12 December 2022
Tender closing date: 31 January 2023 17:00:00

**Summary of the solicitation**
VIA Rail Canada Inc. is seeking suppliers to provide security guard services for its Police and Corporate Security Department across Canada. The primary objectives of the security guards will be to prevent detection-report-intervene for incidents that may arise in VIA Rail properties across the country.

**Tender process**
The solicitation will be evaluated through an open competition. Bidders can submit a proposal on one or multiple segments located throughout Canada based on their capabilities and geographical reach. The tender documents and any supplementary materials are available for download on the Merx website (http://www.merx.com).

**Trade agreements**
The procurement is open to suppliers who can comply with the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA).

**Contact information**
For any enquires regarding this solicitation, please contact:
Name: Jean-Louis Derrey
Email: [Jean-Louis_Derrey@viarail.ca](mailto:Jean-Louis_Derrey@viarail.ca)
Phone: (514) 871-6041

**Additional information**
Access to the solicitation and its supporting documentation is available on Merx (http://www.merx.com). Please note that fees may be applicable for accessing this service. For more information on fees, please visit the Merx pricing page (https://www.merx.com/public/pricing).
